name: Call of Throttle: Dakar Drifter
description:
Call of Throttle: Dakar Drifter is a massive open world of 220 square miles built for speed, jumping, and drift. (Free Version: 5 sq mi)

There is a legend too ridiculous to be true. Told by too many to be false of an Arabian Prince whose vast riches left him bored to death with a world that failed to please him any longer. Convinced nothing else of worth existed he questioned his own existence to find he had but one passion left and through such would he meet his end, destroying his fortunes to grasp one more minute of eternal enjoyment. The Billion dollar Bug they called the fruit of his madness. A vehicle whose power was beyond measurement, speed beyond human tolerance, endurance atomically infinite. This ultimate drift car. The endless realm he carves.

Call of Throttle: Dakar Drifter

Version: Alpha 20 RC3

What's in the Box:
I like to speed. I like to jump. I like to slide. I like games that can play themselves while I eat. 'The Two Shadows' Chernobyl and Colossus meet San Andreas. This is a vast lonely game in which your daily worries will die. A game within which your need for more speed may jump and slide. Call of Throttle: Dakar Drifter. Find your eternal enjoyment now. Try it for Free, or Buy it Today.
